name: Concatenation of array elements
instruction:
Write a function `compoundWord` that takes one parameter - `array`.

The array contains 2 elements - strings.
For example: `['foot', 'ball']`

The function should return the union of the array elements.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
compoundWord(['make', 'up']); // 'makeup'
```

A similar example with numbers:
```javascript
function addNum(numbers) {
return numbers[0] + numbers[1] + numbers[2];
}

console.log(addNum([1, 12, 23])); // 36
console.log(addNum([10, 20, 30])); // 60
```
